Description: Age of person who received the call
Marital status (categorical: 'divorced','married','single','unknown'; note: 'divorced' means divorced or widowed)
Education level of the person who received the call (categorical: 'basic.4y','basic.6y','basic.9y','high.school','illiterate','professional.course','university.degree','unknown')
Does the receiver have credit in default?
Contact communication type of the call either  'cellular' or 'telephone'
Last contact day of the week
